TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LogicalDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies a logical direction in which to perform certain text operations, such as inserting, retrieving, or navigating through text relative to a specified position (a ).

remarks.format: ## Examples One of the ways in which this enumeration is used to determine where to place a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> when new content is inserted. A value of **Backward** places the text position directly before the new content, whereas a value of **Forward** places the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> directly after the new content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection Backward = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Backward, or from right to left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection Forward = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Forward, or from left to right.
